episodes.title: I SURVIVED: Any Time You Believe A Man Is God You're Brainwashed
episodes.description: Amber is 9 years old when her adoptive parents move the family to Utah where they become involved in a fundamentalist mormon cult known as the Zionist society. Khalil is a college student when a friend introduces him and his fiancée to the Nation of Yahweh. Elishah was born into the Tony and Susan Alamo Christian Foundation, where here parents were founding member of the church.
